### st_contains example, fcd segment search by polygon 





 

```sql
SET @muhsinPolygon = GeomFromText ( 'POLYGON((37.01909392869985 39.732083520292754,37.02707618272817 39.73419572417838,37.03181040538319 39.73767629475624,37.036284552320566 39.732639245541264,37.03822678484526 39.72907854779074,37.041037739892865 39.72668563433992,37.04301953241504 39.72486399313313,37.04370617792285 39.72570567025911,37.03913569376147 39.729044261882606,37.036560773107176 39.733862844851075,37.03265547678149 39.738219081996206,37.03858235091057 39.74378502660361,37.0442304618227 39.748870191611125,37.05038930194124 39.75141471005841,37.05686951892122 39.75364179837234,37.05590392367586 39.75454911000533,37.04466589670649 39.75029007075935,37.04179978478038 39.74827406993398,37.034439803243515 39.74162506751527,37.03207945931041 39.739216089453684,37.02740168678844 39.744182452068486,37.02602839577281 39.74578283153712,37.02409399618322 39.7474925552291,37.02357901205236 39.74671713751491,37.02763451208288 39.74282341876739,37.031132112638296 39.738450972332814,37.02643761795587 39.73488487623314,37.0187080108128 39.73299307041226,37.01909392869985 39.732083520292754))' );
SELECT
	SegmentId,
	Lengthmm,
	RoadClass,
	OptimalSpeedKph,
	SpeedLimitKph,
	WKT 
FROM
	FCD_EAST 
WHERE
	ST_CONTAINS (
		@muhsinPolygon,
	LineStringFromText ( WKT ) 
	)

```
